description: Search for associated transcripts that meet the specified criteria.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot associated with the transcripts that you are searching.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot containing the transcripts that you are searching.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the transcripts to search. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

parameters.name: botRecommendationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot recommendation associated with the transcripts to search.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A list of filter objects. (dict) --- Filters to search for the associated transcript. The name of the field to use for filtering. The allowed names are IntentId and SlotTypeId. The values to use to filter the transcript. (string) ---

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the field to use for filtering. The allowed names are IntentId and SlotTypeId.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The values to use to filter the transcript.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot associated with the transcripts that you are searching.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot containing the transcripts that you are searching.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the transcripts to search. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot recommendation associated with the transcripts to search.

nested_items.name: nextIndex
nested_items.description: A index that indicates whether there are more results to return in a response to the SearchAssociatedTranscripts operation. If the nextIndex field is present, you send the contents as the nextIndex parameter of a SearchAssociatedTranscriptsRequest operation to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: associatedTranscripts
nested_items.description: The object that contains the associated transcript that meet the criteria you specified.

nested_items.name: transcript
nested_items.description: The content of the transcript that meets the search filter criteria. For the JSON format of the transcript, see Output transcript format.

nested_items.name: totalResults
nested_items.description: The total number of transcripts returned by the search.
